actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To amend the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2020 to direct the Secretary of Defense to include a description of programs to address and reduce the stigma associated with seeking assistance for mental health or suicidal thoughts in a report.
short_title: Military Mental Health Stigma Reduction Act

summary.text:
Military Mental Health Stigma Reduction Act

This bill requires the Department of Defense, as part of required reports concerning suicide among members of the Armed Forces, to include a description of military programs that address and reduce the stigma associated with seeking assistance for mental health or suicidal thoughts.

titles.title: Military Mental Health Stigma Reduction Act
